name: Screw The Tower Up
description:
"Screw the tower up" is an arcade game for Android made in 4 days for a workshop in ECV Lille - School of visual communication.

You play a thief whose goal is to climb the highest possible to catch the treasure, but you have to take care because every color has importance!

Quick and fun, with only one control (tap), and only 5 levels but might receive updates later!

Development team:

  • Antony Lorgeoux@monkeyjukebox
  • Capucine Moreau @CM2002
  • Gemma Lelli @Solya
